titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

change.ab: Transcribed cards. s1: <*> = "c"? a check mark? <*> = "Adnjoole"? <*> = "Case is allerica"? <*> = "THIN"? <*> = illegible date, likely "May 7"
